answers.answer: I'm sorry you had to have the emergency induction with your first. It sounds like it was the best route at the time.My advise is to read up on the stages of labor. This will help you a lot when determining when it's the real deal. You can simply google it or I like the Bradley Method book because they do a good job of talking about the stages of labor.Best wishes to you!!!

question: I'm pregnant with my secound child and as crazy as this sounds I'm scared I'm not gonna no if I'm in labor or not this is my reasoning with my first I had to have an emergency diliverly they induced me ( I had preeclampsia) and well I was induced at 10:30 and I was in labor and had to have an epadural by noon (had to have epadural cause they thought I was gonna have a heart attack) so I honestly don't remeber going into labor it all happened so fast one minute I was  at my check up everything looking okay next minute they were inducing me. So I'm asking does anyone have advice for me?
title: scared
